name: Tenfold Loop
description:
You are trapped inside your worst nightmare... School! in an endless loop.



Rules of the game
  • Find anomalies (Don't overlook any anomaly)
  • If you do find any anomaly, turn back! Some anomalies have specific interactions to escape them successfully.
  • If you don't find any anomaly, do not turn back.
  • Find 10 consecutive anomalies to exit.

Tenfold Loop is a short walking simulator where the player is trapped inside an endless loop. The only way to finish the game is to find 10 consecutives anomalies.
